data.Name: Wake Up and Live - A Bob Marley Tribute
data.Description: High Plainz Strains* Presents:Wake Up and Live - A Bob Marley Tribute - LIVE IN CONCERT ***Special Offers from High Plainz Strains in Garden City, CO with attendance for 21+.*** https://www.highplainzstrains.com 9:00 Doors Open | 9:30pm Showtime | All Responsible Ages Permitted | *PHOTO ID REQUIRED FOR ENTRY The Moxi Theater is operating at Full CapacityReserve a Table in Advance Online The Moxi is NOT requiring masks for guests, nor are we requiring proof of Vaccinations or negative Covid tests. Please stay home if you are feeling sick or have been recently exposed to someone not feeling well. Any additional questions should be directed to info@moxitheater.comMoxi Theater is operating at Full CapacityReserve a Table in Advance Online.All Responsible Ages Permitted*PHOTO ID REQUIRED FOR ENTRYThe Moxi Theater is proudly partnered with Lunas Tacos s is located at 806 9th St. - next door to the Moxi and is open for Dinner, Happy Hour, and Late Night. Lunas is the perfect place to eat and drink before or after the show!Stellas Pinball Arcade s directly beneath the Moxi before the show. Now serving Burgers, Apps, Cocktails, Icees, and fun for all ages. Open 6 days a week!
